short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Surfer, the Google Chrome extension that's set to reshape the way you navigate the web using Bing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready to level up your online search experience with the power of cutting-edge technology. Introducing Search Surfer, the Google Chrome extension that's set to reshape the way you navigate the web through a custom search bar with Results by Microsoft Bing on the New tab page.

By clicking "Add To Chrome", you accept and agree to install the Search Surfer Extension and set the new tab search to the one provided by the service. The search features within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

Privacy policy https://www.search-surfer.com/privacy-policy

Terms of use https://www.search-surfer.com/terms
